alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 9:36PM CST until January 25 at 10:48PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice For the Bayou Des Cannes...including Eunice...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday evening at 945 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes near Eunice. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins along the bayou with a few structures right along the bayou threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 1.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday evening to a crest of 16.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 1.2 Mon 9 pm CST 10.8 16.4 15.4 &&
